mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MeasureData(sid, pid, parame, value, startTime, endTime) VALUES(#{sid},#{pid},#{parame}, #{value}, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{startTime}, '000'), '%y.%m.%d-%H:%i:%S.%f'), STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endTime}, '000'), '%y.%m.%d-%H:%i:%S.%f'))
mapper.select: select * from MeasureData order by mid desc
SELECT * FROM MeasureData md WHERE parame ='rvs'

SELECT * FROM MeasureData WHERE mid in ( (SELECT max(mid) FROM MeasureData t1 WHERE parame = 'mv') ,(SELECT max(mid) FROM MeasureData t1 WHERE parame = 'rr') ,(SELECT max(mid) FROM MeasureData t1 WHERE parame = 'spo2') ,(SELECT max(mid) FROM MeasureData t1 WHERE parame = 'tv'))
